register.reg_condition: when FEAT_SRMASK is implemented and FEAT_AA64 is implemented

purpose_text.para: Mask register to prevent updates of fields in TCR2_EL2 on writes.

configuration_text.para: If EL2 is not implemented, this register is RES0 from EL3.
This register has no effect if EL2 is not enabled in the current Security state.

access_permission_text.para: When the Effective value of HCR_EL2.E2H is 1, without explicit synchronization, accesses from EL2 using the accessor name TCR2MASK_EL2 or TCR2MASK_EL1 are not guaranteed to be ordered with respect to accesses using the other accessor name.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
MRS
MSRregister
